subject: Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Craig Robinson understood that few thought he could win when he took over as the men’s basketball coach at Brown before the 2006-7 season, but the Bears are considered among the favorites for the league title.
snippet: Craig Robinson understood that few thought he could win when he took over as the men’s basketball coach at Brown before the 2006-7 season, but the Bears are considered among the favorites for the league title.
